verses.text: And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I \add am\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; I \w can|strong="H3201"\w* no more go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*: also the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Thou shalt not go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* this \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he will go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \add and\add* he will \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and thou shalt \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* them: \add and\add* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, he shall go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them as he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* and to \w Og|strong="H5747"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of them, whom he \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall give them \w up|strong="H5414"\w* before your \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, that ye may \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them according unto all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you.

Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of a good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, nor be \w afraid|strong="H6206"\w* of \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he \add it is\add* that doth \w go|strong="H1980"\w* with thee; he will not \w fail|strong="H7503"\w* thee, nor \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of a good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*: for thou must \w go|strong="H0935"\w* with this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them; and thou shalt cause them to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* it.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he \add it is\add* that doth \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; he will be with thee, he will not \w fail|strong="H7503"\w* thee, neither \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, neither be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* it unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, which \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and unto all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, At the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \add every\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w solemnity|strong="H4150"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w release|strong="H8059"\w*, in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w*,

When all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which he shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, thou shalt \w read|strong="H7121"\w* this \w law|strong="H8451"\w* before all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in their \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w*.

\w Gather|strong="H6950"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, and thy \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \add is\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, that they may \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and that they may \w learn|strong="H3925"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*:

And \add that\add* their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, which have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \add any thing\add*, may \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* ye \w live|strong="H2416"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* whither ye go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Behold, thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* that thou must \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and \w present|strong="H3320"\w* yourselves in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, that I may give him a \w charge|strong="H6680"\w*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w presented|strong="H3320"\w* themselves in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* in a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*: and the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* over the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Behold, thou shalt \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* with thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* will rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w strangers|strong="H5236"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whither they \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \add to be\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them, and will \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* me, and \w break|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which I have \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with them.\f + \fr 31.16 \ft sleep: Heb. lie down\f*

Then my \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* shall be \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against them in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and I will \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* them, and I will \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from them, and they shall be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w evils|strong="H7451"\w* and \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w* shall \w befall|strong="H4672"\w* them; so that they will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, Are not these \w evils|strong="H7451"\w* \w come|strong="H4672"\w* upon us, because our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* not \w among|strong="H7130"\w* us?\f + \fr 31.17 \ft befall: Heb. find\f*

And I will \w surely|strong="H5641"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for all the \w evils|strong="H7451"\w* which they shall have \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w*, in \w that|strong="H3588"\w* they are \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

Now therefore \w write|strong="H3789"\w* ye this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* for you, and \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* it the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w put|strong="H7760"\w* it in their \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, that this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* may be a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* for me against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For when I shall have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*; and they shall have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* and \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* themselves, and waxen \w fat|strong="H1878"\w*; then will they \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, and \w provoke|strong="H5006"\w* me, and \w break|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, when \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w evils|strong="H7451"\w* and \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w* are \w befallen|strong="H4672"\w* them, that this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* shall \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* them as a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*; for it shall not be \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* out of the \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* of their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*: for I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* their \w imagination|strong="H3336"\w* which they go \w about|strong="H6213"\w*, even \w now|strong="H3117"\w*, before I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w*.\f + \fr 31.21 \ft against: Heb. before\f*\f + \fr 31.21 \ft go…: Heb. do\f*

¶ \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* therefore \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* it the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he gave \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w* a \w charge|strong="H6680"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of a good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*: for thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto them: and I will be with thee.

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w writing|strong="H3789"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w law|strong="H8451"\w* in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, until they were \w finished|strong="H8552"\w*,

That \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, which \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* this \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* it in the \w side|strong="H6654"\w* of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that it may be there for a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against thee.

For I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w rebellion|strong="H4805"\w*, and thy \w stiff|strong="H7186"\w* \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*: behold, while I am yet \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* with you this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, ye have been \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and how much more \w after|strong="H0310"\w* my \w death|strong="H4194"\w*?

¶ \w Gather|strong="H6950"\w* unto me all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, and your \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*, that I may \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w call|strong="H5749"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* to \w record|strong="H5749"\w* against them.

For I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \w after|strong="H0310"\w* my \w death|strong="H4194"\w* ye will \w utterly|strong="H7843"\w* \w corrupt|strong="H7843"\w* \add yourselves\add*, and turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you; and \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* will \w befall|strong="H7122"\w* you in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; because ye will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to provoke him to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* through the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, until they were \w ended|strong="H8552"\w*.
